data_table.description: Subject ID, died center, age at enrolment, race, ethnic, gender, body weight, body height, BMI, systolic and diastolic blood pressure, measurement of several parameters during 6 minutes work, CT slicer, CT scanner, heart rate, oxygen saturation and therapy, medical history of back pain, cancer, cardio vascular diseases, diabetes, digestive system diseases, eye diseases, general health, musculoskeletal diseases, painful joint type, respiratory tract disease, smoking, and walking limbs, medication history of treatment with beta-agonist, theophylline, inhaled corticosteroid, Oral corticosteroids, ipratropium bromide, and tiotroprium bromide, respiratory disease, St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire, SF-36 Health Survey, spirometry, and VIDA of participants with or without chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and involved in the "Genetic Epidemiology of COPD (COPDGene) Funded by the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute" project.

variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Dbgap_id

variable.name: deid_center
variable.description: De-identified site code

variable.name: ExclusionaryDisease
variable.description: Other primary disease so subject excluded from COPD disease analysis [ILD, Bronchiectasis]

variable.name: distwalked
variable.description: Distance walked [ft]

variable.name: O2
variable.description: Supplemental Oxygen used during 6-min walk [L/min]

variable.name: Walk_Course
variable.description: Six minute walk: course layout

variable.name: Walk_Limit
variable.description: Six minute walk: was your walking limited?

variable.name: WalkSymp_BackPain
variable.description: Walk symptoms: back pain

variable.name: WalkSymp_JointPain
variable.description: Walk symptoms: joint pain

variable.name: WalkSymp_Legs_Fatigue
variable.description: Walk symptoms: leg discomfort/fatigue

variable.name: WalkSymp_ShortnessBreath
variable.description: Walk symptoms: shortness of breath

variable.name: QA_CalciumCalPad
variable.description: QA_CalciumCalPad

variable.description: CT scanner

variable.name: FinalApproval
variable.description: CT scan final approval

variable.name: diasBP
variable.description: Diastolic blood pressure [mmHg]

variable.name: gender
variable.description: Gender

variable.name: HR
variable.description: Heart rate [bpm]

variable.name: O2_Hours_Day
variable.description: On typical 24-hour day how many hours supplemental 02 used [hours]

variable.name: O2_Therapy
variable.description: Does subject use supplemental 02 therapy

variable.name: O2_Years
variable.description: How long have they used supplemental 02 [years]

variable.name: Resting_SaO2
variable.description: Resting SaO2 %

variable.name: SysBP
variable.description: Systolic blood pressure [mmHg]

variable.name: Weight_KG
variable.description: Weight [kg]

variable.name: Height_CM
variable.description: Height [cm]

variable.name: BMI
variable.description: BMI

variable.description: Oxygen use: at rest

variable.name: O2use_exercise
variable.description: Oxygen use: exercise

variable.name: O2use_sleep
variable.description: Oxygen use: sleep

variable.name: race
variable.description: Race

variable.description: Your ethnic background

variable.name: HealthStatus
variable.description: Health status

variable.description: High cholesterol

variable.description: Heart attack [MI]

variable.name: BloodClots
variable.description: Blood clots [in legs or lungs]

variable.name: MacularDegen
variable.description: Macular degeneration

variable.name: PeriphVascular
variable.description: Peripheral vascular disease

variable.description: Gastroesophageal reflux

variable.description: Stomach ulcers

variable.name: CompressFracBack
variable.description: Compression fractures [in your back]

variable.description: Hip fracture

variable.name: OsteoArth
variable.description: Osteoarthritis

variable.name: Osteoporosis
variable.description: Osteoporosis [thin bones]

variable.name: RheumArth
variable.description: Rheumatoid arthritis

variable.name: StiffPainLimitWk
variable.description: Stiffness/pain in joints/bones limit ability to walk

variable.name: StiffPainBack
variable.description: Chronic stiffness/pain in back

variable.name: LimitWalkMost
variable.description: What limits your walking most

variable.name: CABG
variable.description: Coronary artery bypass surgery [CABG]

variable.name: Angioplasty
variable.description: Angioplasty or cardiac stents placed

variable.name: Alpha1Test
variable.description: Have you been tested for Alpha1 antitrypsin deficiency

variable.description: A1AD: phenotype/genotype

variable.name: PhenoGenoDK
variable.description: A1AD: do not know phenotype

variable.name: PhenoGenoMGLevel
variable.description: A1AD: test MG Level

variable.name: HowSoonSmoke
variable.description: How soon after waking do you smoke first cigarette

variable.name: SmokeMore2hrs
variable.description: Smoke more during first 2 hours of day than rest of day

variable.name: CigHateGiveUp
variable.description: Which cigarette would you hate most to give up
variable.value: Any other cigarette of the day

variable.name: FindHardNotSmoke
variable.description: Do you find it hard to not smoke in forbidden places

variable.name: SmokeSickBed
variable.description: Smoke when so ill you are in bed most of day

variable.name: SmokeMenthol
variable.description: Do you now or did you smoke menthol cigarettes

variable.name: PainfulJoints
variable.description: Do you have any joints that are painful stiff or achy?

variable.name: LowerBackPain
variable.description: Do you have lower back buttock or radiating leg pain?

variable.name: PainJointType_Shoulder
variable.description: Painful joint type: shoulder

variable.name: PainJointType_Elbow
variable.description: Painful joint type: elbow

variable.name: PainJointType_Wrist
variable.description: Painful joint type: wrist or hand

variable.name: PainJointType_Hip
variable.description: Painful joint type: hip groin thigh

variable.name: PainJointType_Knee
variable.description: Painful joint type: knee

variable.name: PainJointType_Foot
variable.description: Painful joint type: foot or ankle

variable.name: bagonist
variable.description: Inhaled short-acting beta-agonist

variable.name: bagonistlongact
variable.description: Long-acting beta-agonist

variable.name: CombcCSBagon
variable.description: Combination inhaled corticosteroid and beta-agonist

variable.name: combivent
variable.description: Combination short-acting medication

variable.name: Cortsterinhal
variable.description: Inhaled corticosteroids

variable.name: CortsterOral
variable.description: Oral corticosteroids

variable.name: CurrentMedUse
variable.description: Currently do you use medications to treat breathing problem

variable.name: ipratrop
variable.description: Ipratropium bromide

variable.name: nebulizer
variable.description: Nebulizer for an inhaled medication

variable.name: theoph
variable.description: Theophylline

variable.name: tiotrop
variable.description: Tiotroprium bromide

variable.name: HaveCough
variable.description: Do you usually have a cough [exclude clearing of throat]

variable.name: Cough4Plus
variable.description: If yes usually as much as 4 tims a day 4+ days per week

variable.name: CoughAM_yn
variable.description: Do you usually cough first thing in the morning?

variable.name: CoughRestDay
variable.description: Do you usually cough during rest of day or night

variable.name: Cough3Mo
variable.description: Cough like this most days for 3 consecutive months or more

variable.name: CoughNumYr
variable.description: How many years have you had this cough

variable.name: HavePhlegm
variable.description: Do you usually bring up phlegm from your chest

variable.name: PhlegmOften
variable.description: Do you usually bring up phlegm 2 times a day 4 or more days

variable.name: PhlegmAM
variable.description: Usually bring up phlegm from chest first thing in morning

variable.name: PhlegmRestDay
variable.description: Usually bring up phlegm from chest rest of day or at night

variable.name: Phlegm3Mo
variable.description: Usually bring up phlegm on most days for 3 months or more

variable.name: PhlegmNumYr
variable.description: How many years have you had trouble with phlegm

variable.name: EpisodeCghPhlm
variable.description: Episodes of increased cough/phlegm lasting 1 week or more

variable.name: NumEpisodeLastYr
variable.description: How many episodes of increased cough/phlegm in past 12 months

variable.name: YrsEpisodeLast
variable.description: How many years had at least one episode of increased cough/phlegm per year

variable.name: ChstWheezyWhist
variable.description: Ever had wheezing or whistling in chest

variable.name: AgeWheezWhist
variable.description: How old when you had first wheezing/whistling in chest

variable.name: AgeWheezWhistDK
variable.description: Age wheezing started: don't know

variable.name: ShrtBrthAttk
variable.description: Had an attack of wheezing/whistling in chest

variable.name: AgeFirstAttack
variable.description: How old when you had first attack of wheezing

variable.name: AgeFirstAttackDK
variable.description: Age first attack of wheezing: don't know

variable.name: ShrtBrth2Plus
variable.description: Have you had 2 or more shortness of breath episodes

variable.name: MedorTreatAttack
variable.description: Have you ever required medicine/treatment for attacks

variable.name: ChestWheez12mo
variable.description: In last 12 months had wheezing or whistling in chest

variable.name: WithCold
variable.description: Wheezing: when you have a cold

variable.name: ApartFromCold
variable.description: Wheezing: occasionally apart from colds

variable.name: MoreOnceAWeek
variable.description: Wheezing: more than once a week

variable.name: MostDaysNights
variable.description: Wheezing: most days and nights

variable.name: AwakeByCough
variable.description: Awakened from sleep by cough not from colds/chest infection

variable.name: AwakeByShrtBrth
variable.description: Awakened from sleep by shortness of breath/tightness in chess

variable.name: SneezRunnyNose
variable.description: Sneezing/runny/blocked nose when you did not have a cold/flu

variable.name: ItchyBurningEye
variable.description: Watery/itchy/burning eyes but not have cold or flu

variable.name: UnablWalkCondOth
variable.description: Can't walk due to condition other than shortness of breath

variable.name: LtdUphill
variable.description: Have shortness of breath when hurrying or slight uphill

variable.name: LtdLevelSlow
variable.description: Have to walk slower than others due to shortness of breath

variable.name: LtdLevelStop
variable.description: Have to stop for breath when walk on the level at own pace

variable.name: LtdLvlStop100
variable.description: Have to stop for breath after 100 yards on level ground

variable.name: LtdNotLeaveHm
variable.description: Too breathless to leave the house on dressing/undressing

variable.name: ERLungProb
variable.description: Been to emergency room or hospitalized for lung problems

variable.name: ERLungProbtimes
variable.description: How many times

variable.name: TreatChestIll
variable.description: Have you been to treated with antibiotics for chest illness

variable.name: TreatChestTimes
variable.description: How many times treated with antibiotics for chest illness

variable.name: TreatSteroids
variable.description: Been treated with steroid pills or injections

variable.name: TreatSteroiTimes
variable.description: If yes how many times

variable.name: FlareupChestTrb
variable.description: Had a flare-up of chest troubles in last 12 months

variable.name: Asthma
variable.description: Asthma: have you ever had asthma

variable.name: AsthmaAge
variable.description: Asthma: at about what age did asthma start

variable.name: AsthmaAgeDK
variable.description: Asthma: asthma as a child; age not known

variable.name: AsthmaDxByDr
variable.description: Asthma: diagnosed by doctor or other health professional

variable.name: AsthmaStillHave
variable.description: Asthma: do you still have asthma

variable.name: AsthmaAgeStop
variable.description: Asthma: if you no longer have asthma at what age did it stop

variable.name: AsthmaStopChild
variable.description: Asthma: asthma stopped as a child; age not known

variable.name: AsthmaTreat
variable.description: Asthma: received medical treatment or used medications/inhaler

variable.name: HayFev
variable.description: Hayfever: have you ever had hay fever (allergy involving nose or eyes)

variable.name: HayFevAge
variable.description: Hayfever: at about what age did hay fever start

variable.name: HayFevAgeDK
variable.description: Hayfever: hay fever as a child; age not known

variable.name: HayFevDxByDr
variable.description: Hayfever: diagnosed by doctor or other health professional

variable.name: HayFevStillHave
variable.description: Hayfever: do you still have hay fever

variable.name: HayFevAgeStop
variable.description: Hayfever: if you no longer have hay fever at what age did it stop

variable.name: HayFevStill
variable.description: Hayfever: hay fever stopped as a child; age not known

variable.name: HayFevTreat
variable.description: Hayfever: received medical treatment or used medications/nasal spray

variable.name: BronchAttack
variable.description: Bronchitis: have you ever had an attack of bronchitis

variable.name: BronchDxByDr
variable.description: Bronchitis: diagnosed by doctor or other health professional

variable.name: BronchAge
variable.description: Bronchitis: at about what age did you first have bronchitis

variable.name: BronchAgeDK
variable.description: Bronchitis: bronchitis as a child; age not known

variable.name: BronchTimes
variable.description: Bronchitis: how many times have you had bronchitis

variable.description: Pneumonia: have you ever had pneumonia or bronchopneumonia

variable.name: PneuDxByDr
variable.description: Pneumonia: diagnosed by doctor or other health professional

variable.name: PneuAge
variable.description: Pneumonia: at what age did you first have pneumonia/bronchopneumonia

variable.name: PneuAgeDK
variable.description: Pneumonia: pneumonia as a child; age not known

variable.name: PneuTimes
variable.description: Pneumonia: how many times have you had pneumonia/bronchopneumonia

variable.name: ChronBronch
variable.description: Chronic bronchitis: have you ever had chronic bronchitis

variable.name: ChronBroncDxByDr
variable.description: Chronic bronchitis: diagnosed by doctor or other health professional

variable.name: ChronBroncAge
variable.description: Chronic bronchitis: at about what age did it start

variable.name: ChronBrncStillHv
variable.description: Chronic bronchitis: do you still have it

variable.name: ChronBroncTreat
variable.description: Chronic bronchitis: received medical treatment or used medications/inhaler

variable.description: Emphysema: diagnosed by doctor or other health professional

variable.description: Emphysema: at about what age did it start

variable.name: EmphStillHave
variable.description: Emphysema: do you still have it

variable.name: EmphTreat
variable.description: Emphysema: received medical treatment or used medications/inhaler

variable.description: COPD: have you ever had COPD

variable.description: COPD: diagnosed by doctor or other health professional

variable.description: COPD: at about what age did COPD start

variable.description: COPD: do you still have COPD

variable.description: COPD: received medical treatment or used medications/inhaler

variable.name: SleepApnea
variable.description: Sleep apnea: have you ever had sleep apnea

variable.description: Sleep apnea: diagnosed by doctor or other health professional

variable.name: SleepApAge
variable.description: Sleep apnea: at about what age did sleep apnea start

variable.name: SleepApStillHav
variable.description: Sleep apnea: do you still have sleep apnea

variable.description: Sleep apnea: in past 12 months have you received any treatment for sleep apnea

variable.name: ChestIllOther
variable.description: Any other chest illnesses

variable.name: ChestOper
variable.description: Any chest operations

variable.name: ChestInj
variable.description: Any chest injuries

variable.name: EverSmokedCig
variable.description: Have you ever smoked cigarettes?

variable.name: SmokStartAge
variable.description: How old were you when you first started cigarette smoking? [Years old]

variable.name: SmokCigNow
variable.description: Do you now smoke cigarettes [as of one month ago]?

variable.name: CigPerDaySmokNow
variable.description: How many cigarettes do you smoke per day now? [Cigarettes/day]

variable.name: SmokStopAge
variable.description: How old were you when you completely stopped smoking? [Years old]

variable.name: CigPerDaySmokAvg
variable.description: Average for entire time how many cigarettes smoked per day [cigarettes/day]

variable.name: CigSmok24hrs_NA
variable.description: Cigarettes smoked past 24 hours - does not apply

variable.name: CigSmok24hrs
variable.description: How many cigarettes have you smoked in the past 24 hours [cigarettes]

variable.name: CigSmok2hrs
variable.description: How many cigarettes have you smoked in the past 2 hours [cigarettes]

variable.name: CigSmokHalfHr
variable.description: How many cigarettes have you smoked in the past half hour [cigarettes]

variable.name: SmokPipeReg
variable.description: Have you ever smoked a pipe regularly?

variable.name: AgeStartSmokPipe
variable.description: Age when started to smoke pipe regularly [years old]

variable.name: SmokPipeNow
variable.description: Do you now smoke a pipe [as of one month ago]

variable.name: QtySmokPipeTob
variable.description: How much pipe tobacco do you smoke per day now? [Oz per day]

variable.name: AgeStopSmokPipe
variable.description: Age when completely stopped smoking pipe [years old]

variable.name: SmokTobPerWeek
variable.description: On average ounces of tobacco smoked per week [oz per week]

variable.name: SmokCigarReg
variable.description: Have you ever smoked cigars regularly?

variable.name: AgeStartSmkCigar
variable.description: Age when started to smoke cigars regularly [years old]

variable.name: SmokCigarNow
variable.description: Do you now smoke cigars [as of one month ago]

variable.name: CigarPerDayNow
variable.description: How many cigars do you smoke per day now. [Cigars per day]

variable.name: AgeStopSmokCigar
variable.description: Age when completely stopped smoking cigars [years old]

variable.name: SmokCigarPerWeek
variable.description: On average how many cigars did you smoke per week [cigars per week]

variable.name: MothSmokPreg
variable.description: Did your mother smoke cigarettes when she was pregnant

variable.name: OthSmokChildYrs
variable.description: As a child years lived with someone who smoked [years]

variable.name: OthSmokYrs
variable.description: Since age 18 years lived with someone who smoked [years]

variable.name: ExpSmokAtWorkYr
variable.description: How many years exposed to smoke at work [years]

variable.name: SchoolCompleted
variable.description: Highest degree or level of school completed
variable.value: Some college or technical school no degree
College or technical school graduate (Bachelor's or Associate degree)

variable.name: DustyJobEver
variable.description: Have you ever worked for a year or more in dusty job?

variable.name: FumesJobEver
variable.description: Exposed to gas smoke chemicals other fumes at work?

variable.name: WorkNow
variable.description: Are you working now?

variable.name: WorkDustyJobNow
variable.description: Are you currently working in a dusty job?

variable.name: ExpFumesNow
variable.description: Are you currently exposed to gas smoke chemicals fumes?

variable.name: StopWork
variable.description: Why did you stop working?
variable.value: Retired because of other medical problem
